---
title: Living a Life of Fire
tags:

author: Bonnke, Reinhard
coverImg: data:image/jpeg;base64,
date: 2023-08-15
---

<img src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/71o1YCGLQUL._AC_UF894,1000_QL80_.jpg" alt="Living a life of fire book cover" height="200">

This book is an _adventure_.

It sucks you in and when you finally put it down, the effect is both devastating and gracious. On one hand, you're back in your pale, drab life. On the other hand, a fire is lit in the pits of your heart and it roars, "With God, all things are possible".

Bonnke was a man swallowed by compassion for the lost and it is infectious. Perhaps my favourite aspect of the book is how he relates with the Holy Spirit. It's absolutely illuminating. What God can do with someone who is fully yielded! This book has been an asset for my personal walk with God, and my ministry.

On top of that, it's marvellously written.

See more thoughts in the backlinks.
